definition: to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote

sentences.english: The beet webworm, Loxostege sticticalis Linnaeus (Lepidoptera: Pyralidae), is a serious pest to farming and stockbreeding in Northern China.
sentences.chinese: 草地螟是一種兼具遷飛和滯育特性的重要農業害蟲。

sentences.english: The geomagnetic orientation is one of the important mechanisms for orientation of insects in the long distance migration.
sentences.chinese: 地磁定向是昆蟲遠距離遷飛定向的重要機制之一。

sentences.english: If so, breakdown of their flight muscles may prevent them reaching their destiny.
sentences.chinese: 即使如此，飛翔肌肉的衰竭，可防止它們再次遷飛。

sentences.english: When spring comes , they begin their long journey north .
sentences.chinese: 當春季來臨的時候，它們又開始向北遷飛。

sentences.english: This phenomenon indicates that Coccinella septempunctata survives the summer in upper mountain area and can migrate vertically.
sentences.chinese: 這種現象說明七星瓢蟲具有上山越夏和垂直遷飛行爲。

sentences.english: The migration could hamper more genetic differentiation among different geographic populations.
sentences.chinese: 遷飛阻礙了不同地理種羣間的遺傳分化。
